key.name: ignore-xdg-autostart
key.description: If true the session manager will ignore all XDG system and user autostart entries on login.

key.name: generate-jwmrc
key.description: If true the session manager will generate .jwmrc automatically. Set this to false if you would like to customise the configuration manually.

key.name: desktop-manager
key.description: The session manager will start this program to manage the desktop wallpaper and icons. If blank, JWM will draw the wallpaper.
